articles.title: ‘Avatar’ Rerelease Kicks Off With $900K From 5 Early Markets; China’s Shanghai Disney Holds Special Screening - Deadline

articles.title: The Real Reason Queen Elizabeth Didn't Have An Open Casket - Nicki Swift
articles.description: Thousands lined up to get a glimpse of Queen Elizabeth's casket, but unlike dead popes, the queen did not have an open-casket viewing. There's a reason.
